document.full_text: police on thursday identified an 18-year-old former worthing high school student killed in what appeared to be a gang-related shootout during a girls' football game on campus.
document.title: houston police identify victim of apparent gang shooting
lines_and_colors: police on thursday identified an 18-year-old former worthing high school student killed in what appeared to be a gang-related shootout during a girls' football game on campus.
